Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that "The Simpsons" has a history of portraying events that appear to parallel real-world events, but these instances may not necessarily be accurate predictions.
Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the significance of the show's supposed predictions by implying that it has consistently foretold major news events, without acknowledging the possibility of coincidences or intentional exaggerations for comedic effect.
